alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 6:56PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hyde and northeastern Beaufort Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 656 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Belhaven to Goose Creek State Park. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Belhaven, Sladesville, Ransomville, Ponzer, Scranton, Fairfield, Leechville, Winsteadville, Bayview, Sidney Crossroads, Yeatesville, Goose Creek State Park, Bayview Ferry Terminal, Sydney Crossroads and Pantego. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
